entry.title: DRAFT: interactive tx construction protocol
entry.summary: In an email exchange on the Lightning-dev mailing list, Max Dignan posed a question to Antoine Riard regarding whether PSBT (BIP 174) would be a good solution for transaction collaboration between two peers. Antoine responded that while PSBT is a great protocol for wallet interoperability, it may be a bit too heavy for this specific use case. The context also includes links to the BIP-0174.mediawiki page on Github.
